titles.title: Smarter Pretrial Detention for Drug Charges Act of 2023
Smarter Pretrial Detention for Drug Charges Act of 2023
To give Federal courts additional discretion to determine whether pretrial detention is appropriate for defendants charged with nonviolent drug offenses in Federal criminal cases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Smarter Pretrial Detention for Drug Charges Act of 2023
This bill removes the presumption of pretrial detention for an individual who is charged with a federal drug offense for which the maximum term of imprisonment is 10 years or more.
